subject: Simsonn Pro controller box
description_text:
To Whom it may concern,

How do I go about upgrading the controller box so I can use the simsonn
Manager software?

Pete Hill

conversations.body_text: Hi Pete Hill,  Could you please let me know which calibration software you are using for your Pro Plus pedals? If the firmware version is 1.7.1, we recommend updating to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. If the software indicates that the version is too old, you can manually upgrade the firmware by navigating to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

I am using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. When i try to go to manual update i
cannot select it.

On Tue, Sep 16, 2025 at 9:06 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Pete Hill,     Please send me a screenshot of this interface and let me know the version of your Pro pedals. Also, please let me know which testing software you were using before.

[image: image.png]
I was using freejoy and also using the Simsonn  SimPedalsConfig_V3.5
<https://cdn.simsonn.vip/download/SimPedalsConfig_V3.5.zip> software. Does
it matter that I have the older controller box. I had read online that even
the older controller box could use the newer software.

On Tue, Sep 16, 2025 at 9:50 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Pete Hill,  In that case, upgrading would not be possible. You can consider purchasing a new PlusX control box, which also supports vibration feedback motor interfaces for enhanced functionality.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
